landing.title: Fumana Iqela Lakho Lezopolitiko
landing.subtitle: Phendula imibuzo malunga neembono zakho zezopolitiko uze ufumanise ukuba leliphi iqela loMzantsi Afrika elihambelana neenqobo zakho.
landing.privacy: Iimpendulo zakho zigcinwe kwindawo kwaye azikhe zabelwane.

about.title: Malunga ne-Elekti
about.methodologyText: I-Elekti isebenzisa inkqubo yamanqaku ukudibanisa iimbono zakho zezopolitiko namaqela ezopolitiko aseMzantsi Afrika.
about.howItWorksText: Uphendula imibuzo engama-22 eyakhiwe ngononophelo egubungela iindawo ezinkulu zomgaqo-nkqubo kubandakanywa ukhathalelo lwempilo, imfundo, uqoqosho, ulawulo kunye nemiba yoluntu. Umbuzo ngamnye wenzelwe ukuveza izinto ozikhethayo kwezopolitiko ngaphandle kokuthambekela kwiqela.
about.scoringText: Impendulo nganye oyinikayo ithelekiswa nezikhundla zamaqela ezibhaliweyo ezivela kwiimaniifesto ezisemthethweni, amaxwebhu omgaqo-nkqubo kunye neengxelo zoluntu. Amaqela afumana amanqaku alinganisiweyo ngokusekelwe ekusondelaneni kwezikhundla zawo ezivakalisiweyo neempendulo zakho. La manqaku alinganiswa kwisikali se-0-100, kunye nokufana kwakho okuphezulu kunye nezinye iindlela zichazwe ngokucacileyo. Sikunika nokubeka izinga lokuthembana ukunceda ukuqonda ukuba ukufanelana kwakho kuqinile kangakanani.
about.transparencyText: Zonke izikhundla zamaqela kunye nobunzima bamanqaku zinqunywa ngophando oluqinileyo lwamaxwebhu asemthethweni amaqela. Indlela yethu ivulelekile futhi inokuphononongwa. Asikhethi naliphi na iqela lezopolitiko okanye ingcamango - injongo yethu kuphela kukunceda wenze izigqibo ezinolwazi ezisekelwe kwizinto ozikhethayo kunye nezikhundla ezichazwe ngamaqela.
about.dataSourcesText: Izikhundla zamaqela zicutshungulwa ngononophelo kwiimaniifesto ezisemthethweni zamaqela, amaxwebhu omgaqo-nkqubo, iirekhodi zokuvota zeparamente kunye neengxelo zoluntu eziqinisekisiweyo. Sihlaziya idatha yethu rhoqo ukubonisa utshintsho lomgaqo-nkqubo. Zonke izixhobo zemithombo zivela kumajelo asemthethweni amaqela okanye imibutho yeendaba ehloniphekileyo. Ukuba ukholelwa ukuba naluphi na ulwazi aluchanekanga, samukela izilungiso ngamaxwebhu afanelekileyo.
about.privacyText: Ubumfihlo bakho bubalulekile. Asiqokeleli ulwazi lomntu ka no≈°i noma iimpendulo zemibuzo. Kuphela i-language preference yakho igcinwe kwindawo kwisixhobo sakho. Iimpendulo zemibuzo zakho zikhunyelwe ngqo kwi-URL xa ubantu bagcina - ayikho ibhaliso eserveni, akukho i-database, ayikho ilandelelaniselo.
about.noTrackingText: Asisebenzisi amakhukhi, ii-analytics pixels, okanye naluphi na ubuchwepheshe bokulandela. Asikwazi ukubona iimpendulo zakho, asikwazi ukukwazisa, yaye asinayo umdla wokwenza oko. Iimpendulo zakho zemibuzo azithunyelwa kwiiseva zethu.
about.localOnlyText: Yonke into yenzeka kwisikhangeli sakho. Iimpendulo zakho zigcinwe kuphela kwisixhobo sakho kwaye akukho kwenye indawo. Ukuba ususa idatha yesikhangeli sakho, iziphumo zakho ziyaphela ngonaphakade - asinayo backup kuba asikazange sibe nazo ekuqaleni.
about.sharingText: Xa wabelana ngeziphumo, iimpendulo zakho zifakwa ngqo kwikhonkco le-URL ngokwalo. Oku kuthetha ukuba nabani na onelo link angabona iziphumo zakho, kodwa idatha ayithinti iiseva zethu. Ulawula ukuba ngubani obona iziphumo zakho ngokubeka ubani ufumana elo link. Cima i-link, yaye iziphumo zakho zingasese kwakhona.
about.analyticsText: Sisebenzisa iCloudflare Web Analytics, inkonzo ye-analytics egxile kubumfihlo engatoli amakhukhi, engalandeli abantu ngabanye kwiwebhusayithi, yaye engaqokeleli naluphi na ulwazi oluchongwayo lomntu. Isinika iinkcukacha ezidibanisiweyo ezisiseko (njengokujonga iphepha ngokupheleleyo) ukusinceda siqonde ukuba iwebhusayithi iyasetyenziswa, ngaphandle kokonakalisa ubumfihlo bakho. ICloudflare ayikwazi ukubona iimpendulo zakho zemibuzo okanye ukukuchonga ngokwakho.
about.partiesText: Sibandakanya amaqela amakhulu ali-11 ezopolitiko aseMzantsi Afrika.
about.disclaimerText: Esi sixhobo sisetyenziselwa ulwazi kuphela kwaye asisiyongcebiso yokuvota.
about.viewDataText: Ngomoya wokucaca ngokupheleleyo, unokuvavanya iifayile zethu zedatha ngokwakho. Ezi fayile zeJSON ziqulethe zonke izikhundla zamaqela, ubunzima bamanqaku, kunye nemetadata yemibuzo esetyenziswe yi-algorithm yethu.

anc.desc: I-African National Congress liqela elilawulayo eMzantsi Afrika.

mk.desc: I-uMkhonto we Sizwe Party igxile kutshintsho lwezoqoqosho oluqinile.

eff.desc: I-Economic Freedom Fighters liqela elikwesobunxele kakhulu.

ifp.desc: I-Inkatha Freedom Party ikhuthaza iinqobo zenkcubeko yamaZulu.

vfplus.desc: I-Freedom Front Plus imele iimfuno zama-Afrikaner.

actionsa.desc: I-ActionSA liqela elisembindini eligxile kulawulo olusebenzayo.

acdp.desc: I-African Christian Democratic Party ikhuthaza iinqobo zobuKristu.

ufc.desc: I-Unite for Change igxile ekudibaniseni abantu.

sacp.desc: I-South African Communist Party imele ubukomanisi.

udm.desc: I-United Democratic Movement ikhuthaza idemokhrasi yentlalo, uxolelwano, kunye nemigaqo-nkqubo esebenzayo yokulwa nentlupheko nokungalingani.

aljamah.desc: I-Al Jama-ah imele iinqobo zamaSilamsi kwaye ikhuthaza ubulungisa bentlalo, ulawulo olunesimilo, kunye namalungelo oluntu olucinezelelweyo.

atm.desc: I-African Transformation Movement igxile ekulweni norhwaphilizo, ubunkokheli obunokuziphatha, kunye nokutshintsha uMzantsi Afrika ngokuphendula.

pf.desc: I-Patriotic Front ikhuthaza imigaqo-nkqubo yezwe, ukuzimela kwezoqoqosho, kunye nokubeka phambili iimfuno zabemi boMzantsi Afrika.

cope.desc: I-Congress of the People ikhuthaza idemokhrasi yentlalo, ulawulo olulungileyo, kunye nemigaqo-nkqubo yezoqoqosho elinganisa ukukhula nentlalontle yoluntu.

q1.text: Inkqubo yempilo yoluntu exhaswa ngumphakathi (inkqubo ye-National Health Insurance) kufuneka isekwe ukunikeza ukukhathalelwa kwasimahla kubo bonke.

q2.text: Imfundo ephakamileyo kufuneka ibe simahla kubo bonke abafundi (akukho mali), kungekhona nje uncedo lwemali oluhlolwayo.

q3.text: Urhulumeni kufuneka asebenzise isibonelelo-mali esingenammiqathango kubo bonke abemi, nokuba kufuna irhafu ephezulu okanye ukuboleka.

q4.text: Urhulumeni kufuneka anyuse irhafu kubantu abatyebileyo ukuxhasa iinkqubo zoluntu ezandisiweyo (impilo, imfundo kunye nezibonelelo zentlalo).

q5.text: Urhulumeni kufuneka atyale kakhulu kwizindlu zikawonke-wonke zeentsapho ezingenayo imali eninzi.

q6.text: Utyalo-mali lwezindlu zikawonke-wonke kufuneka lube yinto ephambili nokuba kufuna ukusika ezinye iinkonzo zikawonke-wonke.

q7.text: Uphuhliso lwamaphandle kunye nenkxaso yezolimo (kubandakanywa iinkxaso-mali kunye neziseko zeengqalasizinda zabalimi abancinci) kufuneka ifumane inkxaso-mali enkulu kurhulumeni.

q8.text: Abasebenzi kufuneka babe namalungelo aqinileyo okugweva kunye nokuxoxisana ngqo nabaqeshi ngaphandle kokungenelela kurhulumeni.

q9.text: I-BEE kunye nokwenza ngokulungisa kufuneka kuqhubeke kube ziinkalo eziphambili kurhulumeni ukubuyisela ukungalingani ngokobuhlanga noqoqosho.

q10.text: Ukuthathwa komhlaba wabucala ngaphandle kwembuyekezo yexabiso lemarike kufuneka kuvunyelwe phantsi komthetho ukukhawulezisa uhlaziyo lomhlaba.

q11.text: UMgaqo-siseko kufuneka uhlengahlengiswe apho kuyimfuneko ukukhawulezisa utshintsho kunye nokuvumela ulwabiwo oluqhubekayo.

q12.text: UMzantsi Afrika kufuneka ubeke phambili izivumelwano zorhwebo ezikhusela amashishini asekhaya, nokuba kuthetha amaxabiso aphezulu kubathengi.

q13.text: Ilizwe kufuneka libeke phambili utyalo-mali kumandla ahlaziyekayo (ilanga, umoya) kunokwandisa amandla amalahle.

q14.text: Inyathelo elinamandla lokulwa urhwaphilizo (nokuba liphazamisa iinkokeli zangoku) libaluleke ngaphezu kokugcina uzinzo lwezopolitiko.

q15.text: Ukunciphisa ulwaphulo-mthetho, urhulumeni kufuneka agxile kwisohlwayo esinamandla kunokujongana nezizathu zentlalo ezifana nobuhlwempu.

q16.text: Abafuduki abangekho emthethweni kufuneka bagxothwe kwaye kulawulwe imida eqinileyo ukukhusela imisebenzi kunye nezibonelelo zasekhaya.

q17.text: Urhulumeni kufuneka adale iinkqubo ezinkulu zemisebenzi yoluntu kunye neenkqubo zokuqinisekisa umsebenzi ukunciphisa ukungaqeshwa.

q18.text: Ipropati yabucala kunye namalungelo amashishini amancane kufuneka akhuselelwe ngamandla ekuthathweni kunye nomthetho onzima.

q19.text: Urhulumeni kufuneka aqinise ukukhuselwa komthetho kwabantu be-LGBTQ+ kwaye aqhubele phambili amalungelo alinganayo oluntu.

q20.text: Ukuzimela kwezobulungisa kunye namagunya okuphekelela kufuneka kukhuselelwe ngokungqongqo, nokuba oko kunciphisa ukuguquguquka kwesigqeba.

q21.text: UMzantsi Afrika kufuneka ubeke phambili ukubambisana kwamazwe amaningi kwezodiplomacy norhwebo (ne-EU, i-US kunye nabamelwane base-Afrika) kunokuthambisana ikakhulu namaqela ezopolitiko.

q22.text: Urhulumeni kufuneka andise amagunya okubeka iliso kunye nokufikelela kwidatha yabanyanzelisi bomthetho ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho kunye nobunqolobi, nokuba oko kunciphisa ubumfihlo.
